name: Tag Manager (Lua)
description: Manage entity tags in sections - add, remove, and view tags
author: VS Write Team

tools.name: add_entity_tag
tools.description: Add an entity tag to a section at a specific text range

section_id.description: The ID of the section to add the tag to

entity_id.description: The ID of the entity to tag

from_pos.description: Start position of the tagged text (character offset)

to_pos.description: End position of the tagged text (character offset)

tools.name: remove_entity_tag
tools.description: Remove an entity tag from a section

section_id.description: The ID of the section containing the tag

tag_id.description: The ID of the tag to remove

tools.name: tag_overview
tools.description: Get an overview of all tags in a section or the entire project

section_id.description: Optional section ID to filter tags. If not specified, shows all tags.

group_by.description: Group results by section or entity. Defaults to 'section'.
